summary: Comedy about a naive French country girl in London who helps the war effort by parachuting into German-occupied France to help kidnap an important German general. She bungles through to a heroic finish of plot and counter-plot.
cast: Brigitte Bardot|Jacques Charrier|Ronald Howard|Michael Cramer|René Havard|Mona Goya|Viviane Gosset|Robert Berri|Françoise Belin|Charles Bouillaud|Alain Bouvette|Max Elloy|Jacques Hilling|Ariane Lancell|Günter Meisner|Jenny Orléans|Jean-Pierre Zola|Francis Blanche|Pierre Bertin|Yves Vincent|Noël Roquevert|Hannes Messemer|Rico Lopez|Roland Bartrop|Jean Carmet|Philippe Clair|Albert Dalibert|Pierre Durou|Édouard Francomme|Lutz Gabor|Albert Michel|Max Montavon|Carl Schell|Claude Vernier
keywords: world war two|free french|french officer|suitcase|london england
title: Babette se va a la guerra
